post.body: going around terribly here, take care, take a cold preventatitve med (the new stuff) if you can, my cold got bad,goodluck!
but that song is so awful when done at school LOL who wouldn't want to hear their kid sing or play off key?
I redid it, waiting to see if anything happens
Yeah, I'm making pinto beans
definitely TOOO cold!! It's warmer in Amsterdam!
yup, me too!
I'll check that out thanks :) I learned to write with fountain pen back in '65 :)
regifting is cool :) as long as it's not back to the SAME person LOL
Day 2 of hubby's vacation - hubby backs into an Infinity G blah blah & there goes my new laptop & trip to Holland
Day 1 of hubby's vacation - upset cuz I didn't go to family get together so he could shop without me
Lehtinen and Zubov back in the game, zowie!!!!!!!!!! :) I'm a happy Stars camper. :)
thank goodness for online shopping and free shipping
hubby is home for 2 weeks, will I survive? :)
Au revoir Ms. Majel Barrett Roddenberry, you'll be missed.
Yeah! Stars won last nite! Boo, Zubov needs another hip surgery, poor guy, hopefully, we'll see him next season. Get well soon, Zubie!
never had the flu, till I got flu shots, what's up with that?
Why doesn't Twitter support sending SMS messages to my phone? It's a Palm Treo dadgummit
snow in Dallas? Getting our yearly blow
od'ed on coffee (yes I used an apostrophe, sue me)
It's not the mouse itself that scares me. It's the quickness.
like my geisha?
go dallas stars!!
palmcentro is coolio
Stars lost tonight :( Get 'em next time!
finishing up Robert Silverberg's "Nightwings"
got smart again, setting up the Plum Palm Centro
my smartphone just got retarded, thanks to hubby dropping it on the floor :(
polishing up editing client's book, woohoo!
NBC, Hockey at Wrigley Field, who'da thought? cooooool
Dallas Stars play the New Jersey Devils tonight. It's how we spend NY Eve. Go Stars!
watching Stars & Sharks, GO STARS!
working on my wip
is drumming it up with Rock Band
Stars won in OT!!!!
checking out Palm Treo & Centro phone to update my older Treo 650, where's the sales dude?
catch up editing & taking son to Dr., poor guy, and more catch up editing
finished McLeod's Daughters season 7, sigh
is drumming it up with Rock Band
